cast.overview: When danger threatens her camp, the fierce and highly skilled Comanche warrior Naru sets out to protect her people. But the prey she stalks turns out to be a highly evolved alien predator with a technically advanced arsenal.
cast.title: Prey

details.biography: Kirk comes from a high profile action movie background, having performed and/or choreographed action sequences for Marvel/Disney+, Universal, Netflix, Amazon, HBO/Showtime, CBS, NBC, MGM, 20th Century Fox, Paramount, SONY, Warner Bros/DC Comics, Columbia Pictures, Legendary Ent, Lionsgate, E-One. He's one of a handful of Union Registered Stunt Coordinators with an expertise in Pre-vis and fight design. Recently he was the Co-Stunt Coordinator and Pre-vis artist on the Emmy Nominated movie PREY (2022). Kirk is also a prolific screenwriter and indie film director with 18 accredited awards and nominations for his work. In 2018 UBCP/ACTRA presented him with the 'SAM PAYNE HUMANITY and INTEGRITY AWARD' for his relentless efforts to improve the skills of his fellow stunt performers while raising tens of thousands of dollars for humanitarian projects around the world.
details.name: Kirk Caouette
